resources.string: You do not have privileges to perform this action
Enter a subject to the invitation
You can enter your guests vehicular license plate so they can enter using license plate recognition (optional)
Invitation to [guest_name] to [property] from [start] until [end]. For [days] From [start_time] until [end_time]
Day %s is not in the defined date range.
Date \'From\' must be must be greater than or equal to the current date
Date \'Until\' must be greater than or equal to the date \'From\'
Hour \'Until\' must be greater than or equal to the hour \'From\'
Select the days of the week on which the invitation will be valid
Must enter license plate or deactivate the switch
Our mission is to give you complete control of access to your property in an autonomous, easy and secure way.
In order to use this feature, you must grant call phone permission.
Stores the geolocation of your property to be shared in your invitations
Dear resident the automatic license plate recognition access is not active in your premise, for more information contact your administrator or write to us at ventas@safecard.cl
This property has been already geolocated. Are you sure you want to edit the property geolocation?
The premise has not been geolocated. Geolocation of this property cannot be done
You do not have privileges to perform this action
This feature is not yet available in Huawei devices
Edit and confirm your correct location
Drag this marker to your property.
Safecard needs to access your location.
Wait a moment until we load your information.
Bind the license plate of your vehicle to operate barriers without the need of remote control or other aperture method.
Registering license plate. Wait a moment.
Now also access and control your visitors to parkings with Safecard
Enable your parking access and live a more comfortable and faster experience
You must select at least one sector
You can also send your invitation through:
Your guest is a Safecard user so a notification with your invitation will be received.
Your guest is not a Safecard user so you must sent the invitation by one of the following methods.
\"Open this link to see your Safecard invitation \"
Whatsapp is not installed on your phone, it is not possible to share the invitation by this method
Add new residents associated to a property and define their permissions and access profiles
Set your default property, bind vehicular license plates and more options
Allow Safecard access to your contacts, location and notifications
Allow access notifications and alerts in real time
You will have to enter your PIN each time you open Safecard (safer)
You do not have properties available to do this action
Incorrect PIN. This action cannot be executed
For more safety, we recommend you to change your PIN periodically.
Current PIN must have 4 digits in length
New PIN must have 4 digits in length
Confirmation PIN must have 4 digits in length
The current PIN is invalid, try again
Help us become a safer app. To continue we need to verify you are a person.
Manually access when you do not have your cell phone or if you are out of charge.
Open the app in case you have PIN block activated in your profile (safer).
PIN must have 4 digits in length
PIN must have 4 digits in length
Your PIN has been successfully updated
This resident may create new residents for this property, but cannot give this privilege to those new residents
Defines if this resident has permanent access or for a period of time and to which sectors has access as well
When this option is enabled, the resident may see movements of every residents associated to this property
When this option is enabled, the resident will be able to create invitations for this property
Defines if this resident has permanent access or for a period of time
An admin resident has access to every sector of the property
Date \'Until\' has to be greater or equal to the actual date
Date \'From\' has to be lower or equal to the date \'Until\'
Are you sure you want to block %s?
When blocking this contact all his accesses and active invitations will be blocked.
Are you sure you want to unblock %s?
When unblocking this contact all his accesses and active invitations will be unblocked.
Remember to press SAVE so changes in sectors are shown
You do not have an associated property to Safecard on which to invite.
You do not have available properties to invite
A real first name is required
A real last name is required
An error has happened. Try again.
This QR code changes every 5 seconds
Be sure to be in your property to do geolocation.
Wait a moment while we locate your property.
Enter your PIN to unlock the app
Unlock Safecard by using biometric readings
Date \'From\' has to be lower than date \'Until\'.
It is time to update to the new version.
Press update and go to your Play Store.
This phone number may have been registered in another device
Remember that you can install Safecard on one device each time.
Bind your credit card now and access parkings with Safecard on an easy, quick and safe way
Without queues nor bills that do not work
This feature is not yet available in Huawei devices
Register yourself by providing your information up next
A real first name is required
A real last name is required
Safecard will send you a text message to verify your phone number, enter your country code and phone number

Apparently the number entered does not exist. Try again
Safecard needs internet access to update your information.
You need a Huawei device and Huawei Mobile Services (HMS) in order to use this app
This Safecard version requires an update. Would you like to update it to the latest version?
Waiting to validate the code sent to the phone number [MOBILE]
Text message sent. Wait a moment.

An error has happen. Try again
An operator will contact you in a few moments. Wait a moment.
Safecard needs internet access to update your information.
Compound not geolocated. It cannot be located on the map.

From %s at %s hrs. Until %s at %s hrs.
You do not have privileges to perform this action
Wait while we load the information
You do not have bound license plates
You must select at least one license plate
All selected license plates will be deleted. Are you sure to continue?
You must select at least one sector
You do not have privileges to perform this action
It is not possible to edit owners
Swipe left to continue or right to go back through the tour.

Use the remote control to enter or leave your property and open barriers or gates. \n\nShowing your QR codes en iSafes (totem), you can also operate turnstiles, doors, bulkheads or any device compatible with Safecard.
With Safecard you can send invitations to your contacts so they can enter your property in a fast and safe manner.
Now you can create residents directly from your app in the \'Settings\' menu.\n\n You can define different security levels for each one of the residents of your property.
Check the whole access log on a single click, as an owner you will also be able to see the movements of each resident associated to your property.
Are you sure you want to change your default credit card to \'%s\'?
You must select at least one credit card
All selected credit cards will be deleted. Are you sure to continue?
This sector has only enabled access by remote control
This sector has only enabled access by QR
Alert: It has not leaved yet
Safecard needs access to your contact list.
Safecard needs access to your contact list.
Invitation disabled. Talk to the concierge.
All selected invitations will be deleted. Are you sure to continue?
You must select at least one invitation
Safecard needs access to your contact list.
Safecard needs access to your contact list.
It is necessary to enable GPS or connect to the Local Safecard Wi-Fi
Requesting opening. Please wait a moment.

When you are connected to the local Wi-Fi, Safecard works faster because your cell phone interacts directly with the server of your premise.

Connect now?

To operate the remote control your location needs to be verified.

If you are connected to the Local Wi-Fi, GPS is not mandatory to operate the remote control.

Enable GPS now?
Press and hold the red marker to move it.
